hierarchy.entry_subdomain: Cloud Security Alliance (CSA) Cloud Controls Matrix

active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the challenges of implementing GRM-02 Organizational Alignment in hybrid cloud setups versus on-premises environments. Use examples from CSA CCM and NIST CSF to support arguments on risk ownership and accountability.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
